about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Greedshot!

Are you a prisoner who has been wrongly accused? Or a soldier of fortune who wants to secure a comfortable future for himself? Salvation is what you will find on our Island! We guarantee you warm sand and constant adrenaline, just sign a contract with us. Well, if you pass all the tests, true freedom awaits you at the end!”

Game Features:

  • Greeshot is a unique blend of roguelike with realistic, unforgiving gameplay.
  • Each location and arena environment is generated randomly, making each cycle unique.
  • Artificial intelligence of enemies will help you get a taste of real hardcore
  • A large number of skins for weapons. Add some style to your action
  • The game supports both single player and co-op mode. Killing is more fun together!

content_descriptors.notes: Greedshot is designed for a mature audience and contains elements that may not be suitable for all players. This game features violence. Players will encounter graphic combat scenarios, including the use of firearms and explosives.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions, 20H1 version or newer).
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2 GHz, with AVX, AVX2, and SSE 4.2 support required.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 380 (4 GB).
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions, 20H1 version or newer).
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1400.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT.
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Greedshot is a first-person rogue-lite shooter with procedurally generated locations. Play alone or with friends in co-op mode, facing merciless enemies and environments
